history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> Do you need parking information around UPMC Presby campus?
USER yes I want parking information Kaufmann Clinic
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> </speak>
TTS <speak> You can park within the Kaufmann building at <break strength='weak'/> 3469 Fifth Avenue, or next to UPMC Montefiore off Buffalo Street.<break time='800ms'/></speak>
TTS <speak> Are you looking for a doctor's office?
USER yes Dr Hamilton
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will help you to find a doctor's office. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is the doctor's full name?
USER dr. Hamilton

TTS <speak> I found hamilton's office to be <break strength='strong' /> Suite A-402 at <break strength='weak'/> 200 Lothrop Street, with <break strength='weak'/> Neurological Surgery specialty. Phone number <break strength='weak'/> (412)471-4772. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> I can also help with trip planning. <break strength='strong'/> Do you want public transit directions or driving directions
USER yes public transit
TTS <speak> I can also help with trip planning. <break strength='strong'/> Do you want public transit directions or driving directions
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go?
USER Kaufmann Clinic
TTS Okay, going to upmc kaufmann medical building university of pittsburgh. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Craig and Centre
TTS Okay, leaving from centre avenue and north craig st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER right away
TTS Okay, travelling at 02:53 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER no
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 11 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 71C <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue and Chesterfield Road</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 3:00pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
